item.title: Jurassic World 4’s New Island Twist Gives Rebirth A Major Advantage Over The Last Reboot
item.description: Jurassic World Rebirth doesn't attempt to remake Jurassic Park again. Instead, it's going to a more dangerous dinosaur-filled island.

item.title: Rocky Balboa’s Movie Boxing Record (Every Win & Loss)
item.description: Rocky Balboa had a legendary boxing career in his movie franchise. Here is Rocky's professional fight record, as well as his brawls outside the ring.

item.title: Why The First Mad Max Movie Cost So Little (& How Much Money It Made)
item.description: The original Mad Max was famously cheap and famously profitable, but how did George Miller manage to produce the movie on such a small budget?
